metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3062 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: The mov_read_dref function in libavformat/mov.c in Libav before 11.7 andFFmpeg before 0.11 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(memory corruption) or execute arbitrary code via the entries value in adref box in an MP4 file.

criterions.comment: libav: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
